name: Cognac: Mama-Mash

trigger.text: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

text:
Main: Declare a cost of your choice and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the same cost as the declared cost, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Character with an original cost of 8 or less.
Trigger: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

effect.text: Declare a cost of your choice and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the same cost as the declared cost, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Character with an original cost of 8 or less.
Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
